trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for data source objects that get data by using LINQ queries.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en basisklasse for kilde-dataobjekter som henter data ved hjelp av LINQ-spørringer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSourceView"> </xref> objektet som er forbundet med denne <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Standard datakildevisningen som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakildevisningen som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source view to get.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på datakilden visning du vil hente.

trans-unit.source: The default data source view that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Standard datakildevisningen som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of names that represent views that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling med navn som representerer visninger som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A collection of names that represent views that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En samling med navn som representerer visninger som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the values in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control that must be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden for verdiene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen må være fast.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> object by using the event data.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> objektet ved hjelp av Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: The event data
trans-unit.target: Datatypen hendelsen

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a query is added to or removed from a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en spørring er lagt til eller fjernet fra en kontroll av data.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged*>metoden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.OnDataSourceViewChanged*>

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer gjeldende visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den lagrede tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"></xref> control so that the changes can be stored in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Sporer visningsstatus endringene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryableDataSource"> </xref> kontrollere slik at endringene kan lagres i det <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"> </xref> objekt for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the parameter values that have changed since the previous request.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer parameterverdiene som er endret etter forrige forespørsel.
